headline: IBD Stock Of The Day Hartford Near Entry, Insurance Stocks Defy Sell-Off
summary: Hartford Insurance is the IBD Stock Of The Day for Monday. Shares are near an entry as insurance stocks climb. But investors should wait as the market is in a correction.
